00045 // OB_MESH is assumed
00046 static std::string getActiveUVLayerName(Object *ob)
00047 {
00048     Mesh *me = (Mesh*)ob->data;
00049 
00050     int num_layers = CustomData_number_of_layers(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE);
00051     if (num_layers)
00052         return std::string(bc_CustomData_get_active_layer_name(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE));
00053         
00054     return "";
00055 }
00056 
00057 EffectsExporter::EffectsExporter(COLLADASW::StreamWriter *sw, const ExportSettings *export_settings) : COLLADASW::LibraryEffects(sw), export_settings(export_settings) {}
00058 
00059 bool EffectsExporter::hasEffects(Scene *sce)
00060 {
00061     Base *base = (Base *)sce->base.first;
00062     
00063     while(base) {
00064         Object *ob= base->object;
00065         int a;
00066         for (a = 0; a < ob->totcol; a++)
00067         {
00068             Material *ma = give_current_material(ob, a+1);
00069 
00070             // no material, but check all of the slots
00071             if (!ma) continue;
00072 
00073             return true;
00074         }
00075         base= base->next;
00076     }
00077     return false;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void EffectsExporter::exportEffects(Scene *sce)
00081 {
00082     if (hasEffects(sce)) {
00083         this->scene = sce;
00084         openLibrary();
00085         MaterialFunctor mf;
00086         mf.forEachMaterialInScene<EffectsExporter>(sce, *this, this->export_settings->selected);
00087 
00088         closeLibrary();
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 void EffectsExporter::writeBlinn(COLLADASW::EffectProfile &ep, Material *ma)
00093 {
00094     COLLADASW::ColorOrTexture cot;
00095     ep.setShaderType(COLLADASW::EffectProfile::BLINN);
00096     // shininess
00097     ep.setShininess(ma->har, false , "shininess");
00098     // specular
00099     cot = getcol(ma->specr, ma->specg, ma->specb, 1.0f);
00100     ep.setSpecular(cot, false , "specular" );
00101 }
00102 
00103 void EffectsExporter::writeLambert(COLLADASW::EffectProfile &ep, Material *ma)
00104 {
00105     COLLADASW::ColorOrTexture cot;
00106     ep.setShaderType(COLLADASW::EffectProfile::LAMBERT);
00107 }
00108 
00109 void EffectsExporter::writePhong(COLLADASW::EffectProfile &ep, Material *ma)
00110 {
00111     COLLADASW::ColorOrTexture cot;
00112     ep.setShaderType(COLLADASW::EffectProfile::PHONG);
00113     // shininess
00114     ep.setShininess(ma->har , false , "shininess" );
00115     // specular
00116     cot = getcol(ma->specr, ma->specg, ma->specb, 1.0f);
00117     ep.setSpecular(cot, false , "specular" );
00118 }
00119 
00120 void EffectsExporter::operator()(Material *ma, Object *ob)
00121 {
00122     // create a list of indices to textures of type TEX_IMAGE
00123     std::vector<int> tex_indices;
00124     createTextureIndices(ma, tex_indices);
00125 
00126     openEffect(translate_id(id_name(ma)) + "-effect");
00127     
00128     COLLADASW::EffectProfile ep(mSW);
00129     ep.setProfileType(COLLADASW::EffectProfile::COMMON);
00130     ep.openProfile();
00131     // set shader type - one of three blinn, phong or lambert
00132     if (ma->spec>0.0f) {
00133         if (ma->spec_shader == MA_SPEC_BLINN) {
00134             writeBlinn(ep, ma);
00135         }
00136         else {
00137             // \todo figure out handling of all spec+diff shader combos blender has, for now write phong
00138             // for now set phong in case spec shader is not blinn
00139             writePhong(ep, ma);
00140         }
00141     }
00142     else {
00143         if (ma->diff_shader == MA_DIFF_LAMBERT) {
00144             writeLambert(ep, ma);
00145         }
00146         else {
00147         // \todo figure out handling of all spec+diff shader combos blender has, for now write phong
00148         writePhong(ep, ma);
00149         }
00150     }
00151     
00152     // index of refraction
00153     if (ma->mode & MA_RAYTRANSP) {
00154         ep.setIndexOfRefraction(ma->ang, false , "index_of_refraction");
00155     }
00156     else {
00157         ep.setIndexOfRefraction(1.0f, false , "index_of_refraction");
00158     }
00159 
00160     COLLADASW::ColorOrTexture cot;
00161 
00162     // transparency
00163     if (ma->mode & MA_TRANSP) {
00164         // Tod: because we are in A_ONE mode transparency is calculated like this:
00165         ep.setTransparency(ma->alpha, false , "transparency");
00166         // cot = getcol(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00167         // ep.setTransparent(cot);
00168     }
00169 
00170     // emission
00171     cot=getcol(ma->emit, ma->emit, ma->emit, 1.0f);
00172     ep.setEmission(cot, false , "emission");
00173 
00174     // diffuse multiplied by diffuse intensity
00175     cot = getcol(ma->r * ma->ref, ma->g * ma->ref, ma->b * ma->ref, 1.0f);
00176     ep.setDiffuse(cot, false , "diffuse");
00177 
00178     // ambient
00179     /* ma->ambX is calculated only on render, so lets do it here manually and not rely on ma->ambX. */
00180     if (this->scene->world)
00181         cot = getcol(this->scene->world->ambr*ma->amb, this->scene->world->ambg*ma->amb, this->scene->world->ambb*ma->amb, 1.0f);
00182     else
00183         cot = getcol(ma->amb, ma->amb, ma->amb, 1.0f);
00184 
00185     ep.setAmbient(cot, false , "ambient");
00186 
00187     // reflective, reflectivity
00188     if (ma->mode & MA_RAYMIRROR) {
00189         cot = getcol(ma->mirr, ma->mirg, ma->mirb, 1.0f);
00190         ep.setReflective(cot);
00191         ep.setReflectivity(ma->ray_mirror);
00192     }
00193     // else {
00194     //  cot = getcol(ma->specr, ma->specg, ma->specb, 1.0f);
00195     //  ep.setReflective(cot);
00196     //  ep.setReflectivity(ma->spec);
00197     // }
00198 
00199     // specular
00200     if (ep.getShaderType() != COLLADASW::EffectProfile::LAMBERT) {
00201         cot = getcol(ma->specr * ma->spec, ma->specg * ma->spec, ma->specb * ma->spec, 1.0f);
00202         ep.setSpecular(cot, false , "specular");
00203     }   
00204 
00205     // XXX make this more readable if possible
00206 
00207     // create <sampler> and <surface> for each image
00208     COLLADASW::Sampler samplers[MAX_MTEX];
00209     //COLLADASW::Surface surfaces[MAX_MTEX];
00210     //void *samp_surf[MAX_MTEX][2];
00211     void *samp_surf[MAX_MTEX][1];
00212     
00213     // image to index to samp_surf map
00214     // samp_surf[index] stores 2 pointers, sampler and surface
00215     std::map<std::string, int> im_samp_map;
00216 
00217     unsigned int a, b;
00218     for (a = 0, b = 0; a < tex_indices.size(); a++) {
00219         MTex *t = ma->mtex[tex_indices[a]];
00220         Image *ima = t->tex->ima;
00221         
00222         // Image not set for texture
00223         if (!ima) continue;
00224         
00225         std::string key(id_name(ima));
00226         key = translate_id(key);
00227 
00228         // create only one <sampler>/<surface> pair for each unique image
00229         if (im_samp_map.find(key) == im_samp_map.end()) {
00230             // //<newparam> <surface> <init_from>
00231             // COLLADASW::Surface surface(COLLADASW::Surface::SURFACE_TYPE_2D,
00232             //                         key + COLLADASW::Surface::SURFACE_SID_SUFFIX);
00233             // COLLADASW::SurfaceInitOption sio(COLLADASW::SurfaceInitOption::INIT_FROM);
00234             // sio.setImageReference(key);
00235             // surface.setInitOption(sio);
00236 
00237             // COLLADASW::NewParamSurface surface(mSW);
00238             // surface->setParamType(COLLADASW::CSW_SURFACE_TYPE_2D);
00239             
00240             //<newparam> <sampler> <source>
00241             COLLADASW::Sampler sampler(COLLADASW::Sampler::SAMPLER_TYPE_2D,
00242                                        key + COLLADASW::Sampler::SAMPLER_SID_SUFFIX,
00243                                        key + COLLADASW::Sampler::SURFACE_SID_SUFFIX);
00244             sampler.setImageId(key);
00245             // copy values to arrays since they will live longer
00246             samplers[a] = sampler;
00247             //surfaces[a] = surface;
00248             
00249             // store pointers so they can be used later when we create <texture>s
00250             samp_surf[b][0] = &samplers[a];
00251             //samp_surf[b][1] = &surfaces[a];
00252             
00253             im_samp_map[key] = b;
00254             b++;
00255         }
00256     }
00257 
00258     // used as fallback when MTex->uvname is "" (this is pretty common)
00259     // it is indeed the correct value to use in that case
00260     std::string active_uv(getActiveUVLayerName(ob));
00261 
00262     // write textures
00263     // XXX very slow
00264     for (a = 0; a < tex_indices.size(); a++) {
00265         MTex *t = ma->mtex[tex_indices[a]];
00266         Image *ima = t->tex->ima;
00267         
00268         // Image not set for texture
00269         if (!ima) continue;
00270 
00271         // we assume map input is always TEXCO_UV
00272 
00273         std::string key(id_name(ima));
00274         key = translate_id(key);
00275         int i = im_samp_map[key];
00276         COLLADASW::Sampler *sampler = (COLLADASW::Sampler*)samp_surf[i][0];
00277         //COLLADASW::Surface *surface = (COLLADASW::Surface*)samp_surf[i][1];
00278 
00279         std::string uvname = strlen(t->uvname) ? t->uvname : active_uv;
00280 
00281         // color
00282         if (t->mapto & (MAP_COL | MAP_COLSPEC)) {
00283             ep.setDiffuse(createTexture(ima, uvname, sampler), false , "diffuse");
00284         }
00285         // ambient
00286         if (t->mapto & MAP_AMB) {
00287             ep.setAmbient(createTexture(ima, uvname, sampler), false , "ambient");
00288         }
00289         // specular
00290         if (t->mapto & MAP_SPEC) {
00291             ep.setSpecular(createTexture(ima, uvname, sampler), false , "specular");
00292         }
00293         // emission
00294         if (t->mapto & MAP_EMIT) {
00295             ep.setEmission(createTexture(ima, uvname, sampler), false , "emission");
00296         }
00297         // reflective
00298         if (t->mapto & MAP_REF) {
00299             ep.setReflective(createTexture(ima, uvname, sampler));
00300         }
00301         // alpha
00302         if (t->mapto & MAP_ALPHA) {
00303             ep.setTransparent(createTexture(ima, uvname, sampler));
00304         }
00305         // extension:
00306         // Normal map --> Must be stored with <extra> tag as different technique, 
00307         // since COLLADA doesn't support normal maps, even in current COLLADA 1.5.
00308         if (t->mapto & MAP_NORM) {
00309             COLLADASW::Texture texture(key);
00310             texture.setTexcoord(uvname);
00311             texture.setSampler(*sampler);
00312             // technique FCOLLADA, with the <bump> tag, is most likely the best understood,
00313             // most widespread de-facto standard.
00314             texture.setProfileName("FCOLLADA");
00315             texture.setChildElementName("bump");
00316             ep.addExtraTechniqueColorOrTexture(COLLADASW::ColorOrTexture(texture));
00317         }
00318     }
00319     // performs the actual writing
00320     ep.addProfileElements();
00321     bool twoSided = false;
00322     if (ob->type == OB_MESH && ob->data) {
00323         Mesh *me = (Mesh*)ob->data;
00324         if (me->flag & ME_TWOSIDED)
00325             twoSided = true;
00326     }
00327     if (twoSided)
00328         ep.addExtraTechniqueParameter("GOOGLEEARTH", "double_sided", 1);
00329     ep.addExtraTechniques(mSW);
00330 
00331     ep.closeProfile();
00332     if (twoSided)
00333         mSW->appendTextBlock("<extra><technique profile=\"MAX3D\"><double_sided>1</double_sided></technique></extra>");
00334     closeEffect();  
00335 }
00336 
00337 COLLADASW::ColorOrTexture EffectsExporter::createTexture(Image *ima,
00338                                         std::string& uv_layer_name,
00339                                         COLLADASW::Sampler *sampler
00340                                         /*COLLADASW::Surface *surface*/)
00341 {
00342     
00343     COLLADASW::Texture texture(translate_id(id_name(ima)));
00344     texture.setTexcoord(uv_layer_name);
00345     //texture.setSurface(*surface);
00346     texture.setSampler(*sampler);
00347     
00348     COLLADASW::ColorOrTexture cot(texture);
00349     return cot;
00350 }
00351 
00352 COLLADASW::ColorOrTexture EffectsExporter::getcol(float r, float g, float b, float a)
00353 {
00354     COLLADASW::Color color(r,g,b,a);
00355     COLLADASW::ColorOrTexture cot(color);
00356     return cot;
00357 }
00358 
00359 //returns the array of mtex indices which have image 
00360 //need this for exporting textures
00361 void EffectsExporter::createTextureIndices(Material *ma, std::vector<int> &indices)
00362 {
00363     indices.clear();
00364 
00365     for (int a = 0; a < MAX_MTEX; a++) {
00366         if (ma->mtex[a] &&
00367             ma->mtex[a]->tex &&
00368             ma->mtex[a]->tex->type == TEX_IMAGE &&
00369             ma->mtex[a]->texco == TEXCO_UV)
00370         {
00371             indices.push_back(a);
00372         }
00373     }
00374 }
